attributes.action: take into consideration all the things that John Howard said and make it Britain's policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you haven't heard about what John Howard said, type 'britain needs a leader like this' into google.
If you agree with his statements and want Britain to adopt the same procedures, sign this petition.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
